#Question 1

##Creating a Data Frame

```{problem_1}

set.seed(50)

p1_df = tibble(
  r_sample = rnorm(10),
  pos_vec = r_sample > 0,
  char_vec = c("sara", "steven", "kathryn", "diane", "doug", "anne", "vanessa", "justin", "kaitlyn", "jack"),
  fact_vec = factor(c("blonde","brunette", "brunette", "black", "brunette", "blonde", "brunette", "black", "blonde", "blonde" ))
)

p1_df
```
